subject: Missing Parts Order #SSN3746
description_text:
Dear Simsonn Team,

I received the delivery for Order #SSN3746 today.
When opening and checking the package, I unfortunately noticed that the following items were not included:

Haptic Reactor Set VAM Pro Linear Motor (2 pack / includes power supply)
and the corresponding mounts/holders for the Haptic Reactor set

I was also able to see in the shipment tracking that there is no second package.
Could you please let me know how we should proceed now?

Kind regards,
Daniel Badej

Von meinem iPad gesendet

conversations.body_text: Hi Daniel Badej (dbadej@online. de),     We will ship your items separately because their packaging cannot be combined. Additionally, the processing of your order has been affected by a delay in the latest restocking at our warehouse. We are expediting your shipment, and we kindly ask for a little more patience. Thank you very much for your understanding and support.
Hi Daniel Badej,    We apologize for the inconvenience. We have already reshipped your order. https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047123608680
